testcases.Name: Addition: 508 + -791
testcases.Body:
Test Name: Addition: 508 + -791

Preconditions:
- Calculator is launched
- Standard mode is selected
- Memory is cleared

Test Steps:
1. Enter 508
2. Press +
3. Enter -791
4. Press =

Expected Result:
- Display shows -283
